update_plan.update_summary: Document the updated metadata in README.md, blueprint, and current_status.json files.
key_changes: Addition of metadata for tracking the number and categories of examples processed during AI integration, testing, data pipeline, and trading
Incremental update to metadata of the training process
The change adds metadata to the training summary file, providing information about the number of examples, categories, and timestamps.
